title: Why is this happening and please do something about this
body: I am here sitting and watching my screen thinking what i should do with this game. So uhm where should i start. I decide to play a ranked game while i already have a leaverbuster. Waited 20 minutes and well guess what the game has problems connecting and the fun part is the game is still playing as i type this.i will even make a screen shot and i can't even end this game cause if you disconnect the system will see me as a leaver again.

replies.body: Ugh ended up closing it anyways its not like my leaverbuster will be reduced

First up, don't try troubleshooting your network issues in match made game modes. I don't want you getting more and longer LPQ's if you're just trying to figure out what's wrong. 

These kinds of problems mainly happen when you network is just having some problems getting a stable connection. You had a strong enough connection to get matched with a game, but with all the data flying around once the game starts it must be too much to handle. I'd suggest first updating your port forward and DNS settings since those can make your connection be routed in a better way. If you aren't sure how to do that on your own, check out those steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).
